sonic.name: eddy_cov
sonic.type: Simple eddy covariance w/o water and carbon dioxide fluxes

item.name: Date.Time
item.meanings: Time stamp, assigned to the beginning of averaging block.

item.name: Tot.Data
item.meanings: Total number of data in current averaging block.

item.name: Valid.Data
item.meanings: Number of valid data in current averaging block.

item.name: Vel
item.meanings: Horizontal vector wind speed (m/s) (horizontality respect to instrument plane).

item.name: Vector.Vel
item.meanings: 3D vector wind speed (m/s),

item.name: Scalar.Vel
item.meanings: Scalar wind speed (m/s).

item.name: Scalar.Std
item.meanings: Standard deviation of scalar wind speed (m/s).

item.name: Dir
item.meanings: Vector wind direction (° from North).

item.name: Unit.Vector.Dir
item.meanings: Wind direction computed assuming all individual speeds be 1 m/s (° from North).

item.name: Yamartino.Std.Dir
item.meanings: Estimate of standard deviation of wind direction according to Yamartino method (°).

item.name: Temp
item.meanings: Sonic temperature (°C).

item.name: Phi.Angle
item.meanings: Angle of wind vector to horizontal plane (°).

item.name: Sigma.Phi.Angle
item.meanings: Standard deviation of angle of wind vector to horizontal plane (°).

item.name: Sigma.U
item.meanings: Standard deviation of U wind component in rotated frame (m/s).

item.name: Sigma.V
item.meanings: Standard deviation of V wind component in rotated frame (m/s).

item.name: Sigma.W
item.meanings: Standard deviation of W wind component in rotated frame (m/s).

item.name: Sigma.T
item.meanings: Standard deviation of sonic temperature (°C).

item.name: Theta
item.meanings: Angle of first rotation (°).

item.name: Phi
item.meanings: Angle of second rotation (°).

item.name: Psi
item.meanings: Angle of third rotation (°).

item.name: TKE
item.meanings: Turbulent kinetic energy (m2/s2).

item.name: U.star
item.meanings: Friction velocity (m/s).

item.name: T.star
item.meanings: Turbulent scale temperature (°C).

item.name: z.L
item.meanings: Stability parameter z/L, with 'z' the anemometer height above ground and 'L' the Obukhov Length (adimensional).

item.name: H0
item.meanings: Turbulent sensible heat flux (W/m2).

item.name: H0.Plus.Density.Effect
item.meanings: Turbulent sensible heat flux improved by taking account of density variations (W/m2).

item.name: He
item.meanings: Turbulent latent heat flux (W/m2).

item.name: Eff.W
item.meanings: Effective wind speed, obtained taking density variation into account (m/s).

item.name: Q
item.meanings: Concentration of water vapor (mmol/m3).

item.name: C
item.meanings: Concentration of carbon dioxide (mmol/m3).

item.name: Fq
item.meanings: Turbulent flux of water vapor (mmol/m2 s).

item.name: Fc
item.meanings: Turbulent flux of carbon dioxide (mmol/m2 s).

item.name: N.Dir.N
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from N sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.NNE
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from NNE sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.NE
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from NE sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.ENE
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from ENE sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.E
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from E sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.ESE
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from ESE sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.SE
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from SE sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.SSE
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from SSE sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.S
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from S sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.SSW
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from SSW sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.SW
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from SW sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.WSW
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from WSW sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.W
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from W sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.WNW
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from WNW sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.NW
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from NW sector (adimensional).

item.name: N.Dir.NNW
item.meanings: Number of raw wind samples from NNW sector (adimensional).

item.name: Dominant.Dir
item.meanings: Dominant direction of wind (° from N).

item.name: U
item.meanings: Mean U wind component in non-rotated frame (m/s).

item.name: V
item.meanings: Mean V wind component in non-rotated frame (m/s).

item.name: W
item.meanings: Mean W wind component in non-rotated frame (m/s).

item.name: T
item.meanings: Mean sonic temperature (°C).

item.name: r
item.meanings: Wind speed assuming all individual samples have unit length (m/s).

item.name: Circ.Var
item.meanings: Circular variance (adimensional).

item.name: Circ.Std
item.meanings: Circular standard deviation (adimensional).

item.name: Range.U
item.meanings: Range of U wind component values (m/s).

item.name: Range.V
item.meanings: Range of V wind component values (m/s).

item.name: Range.W
item.meanings: Range of W wind component values (m/s).

item.name: Range.T
item.meanings: Range of sonic temperature values (m/s).

item.name: Nrot.Sigma2.U
item.meanings: Variance of U wind component in non-rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Nrot.Sigma2.V
item.meanings: Variance of V wind component in non-rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Nrot.Sigma2.W
item.meanings: Variance of W wind component in non-rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Nrot.Cov.UV
item.meanings: Covariance between U and V wind components in non-rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Nrot.Cov.UW
item.meanings: Covariance between U and W wind components in non-rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Nrot.Cov.VW
item.meanings: Covariance between V and W wind components in non-rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Nrot.Cov.UT
item.meanings: Covariance between U wind component in non-rotated frame and temperature (°C m/s).

item.name: Nrot.Cov.VT
item.meanings: Covariance between V wind component in non-rotated frame and temperature (°C m/s).

item.name: Nrot.Cov.WT
item.meanings: Covariance between W wind component in non-rotated frame and temperature (°C m/s).

item.name: Rot.Sigma2.U
item.meanings: Variance of U wind component in rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Rot.Sigma2.V
item.meanings: Variance of V wind component in rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Rot.Sigma2.W
item.meanings: Variance of W wind component in rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Rot.Cov.UV
item.meanings: Covariance between U and V wind components in rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Rot.Cov.UW
item.meanings: Covariance between U and W wind components in rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Rot.Cov.VW
item.meanings: Covariance between V and W wind components in rotated frame (m2/s2).

item.name: Rot.Cov.UT
item.meanings: Covariance between U wind component in rotated frame and temperature (°C m/s).

item.name: Rot.Cov.VT
item.meanings: Covariance between V wind component in rotated frame and temperature (°C m/s).

item.name: Rot.Cov.WT
item.meanings: Covariance between W wind component in rotated frame and temperature (°C m/s).

item.name: Ustar.Base
item.meanings: Signed friction velocity in terms of COV(U,W) (m/s).

item.name: Ustar.Extended
item.meanings: Signed friction velocity in terms of COV(U,W) and COV(V,W) (m/s).

item.name: Time.Stamp
item.meanings: Time stamp, assigned to the beginning of averaging block.

item.name: Temp.Mean
item.meanings: Temperature (°C).

item.name: Hrel.Mean
item.meanings: Relative humidity (%).

item.name: Rg.Mean
item.meanings: Global inbound solar radiation (W/m2).

item.name: Rn.Mean
item.meanings: Net solar radiation (W/m2).

item.name: Ruv.Mean
item.meanings: Inbound solar radiation in ultraviolet band (W/m2).

item.name: PAR.Mean
item.meanings: Inbound photosynthetically active radiation (W/m2).

item.name: Fg.Mean
item.meanings: Ground heat flux (W/m2).

item.name: Pa.Mean
item.meanings: Atmospheric pressure (hPa).
